title: Charming Cottage with Ocean Views - Avail Oct - June
posting_body: A charming 1 bedroom cottage in Rockport across from Back Beach.
The cottage location is ideal, a ten-minute walk to Rockport downtown and 15 minutes walk to the commuter rail.
The cottage has wonderful views of the ocean from both the first and second floor.
Features an open first floor set-up: a galley kitchen that leads into the living space with a couch and flatscreen TV.
This area gives way to the dining area which looks out to the yard and the ocean beyond that.
The kitchen and bathroom is on the first floor and has is newly renovated.
The bedroom is accessible up a spiral staircase.
King sized bed where you can wake up looking at the ocean.
The washer/ dryer unit is on the second floor.
There is a balcony off the bedroom with seating area and ocean views.
The property comes fully furnished and is available from Oct 1st - June 1st. .
Rental comes with one parking spot - off street parking in the driveway.
The cottage is one of two on the same lot and shares a yard with the other house on the property.
Monthly rental of $1,950 includes all utilities; heating/ electric, internet, water, and trash disposal and Roku TV (does not include cable).
Rental Application, References, and security deposit of $1,950.
